Body: lately i've decided to unlock bootloader and try some custom rom on huawei y300, and I have tried a lot of roms but none of them was fully functional, on some rom messenger haven't work, some drained battery a lot, on some didnt work network, etc. So can someone provide me a link of stock rom for huawei y300, or link for some fully working rom?Thanks in advance, and sorry for bad english :Dp.s. i have seen thread on modacowhere is a lot of roms but there is lot of dead links and as I said previously they aren't fully functional, so please don't answer to me like "google it" coz i have google it, and didn't find
Title: How to return to stock rom on huawei y300

history.Text: lately i've decided to unlock bootloader and try some custom rom on huawei y300, and I have tried a lot of roms but none of them was fully functional, on some rom messenger haven't work, some drained battery a lot, on some didnt work network, etc. So can someone provide me a link of stock rom for huawei y300, or link for some fully working rom?Thanks in advance, and sorry for bad english :D
How to install stock rom on huawei y300

lately i've decided to unlock bootloader and try some custom rom on huawei y300, and I have tried a lot of roms but none of them was fully functional, on some rom messenger haven't work, some drained battery a lot, on some didnt work network, etc. So can someone provide me a link of stock rom for huawei y300, or link for some fully working rom?Thanks in advance, and sorry for bad english :Dp.s. i have seen thread on [modaco][1]where is a lot of roms but there is lot of dead links and as I said previously they aren't fully functional, so please don't answer to me like "google it" coz i have google it, and didn't find  [1]: http://www.modaco.com/topic/365268-all-custom-roms-for-huawei-ascend-y300g510/
How to return to stock rom on huawei y300
